eth.gateway.description: Cloudflare's Ethereum Gateway lets you interact with the Ethereum network without installing any software on your computer.
eth.gateway.title: Ethereum Gateway
gateways.create.description.title: Gateway Description (Optional)
gateways.create.dns_link.title: DNSLink (Optional)
gateways.create.hostname.description.edi: Gateway hostname cannot be changed. Create a new gateway to select a different hostname.
gateways.create.hostname.title: Hostname
gateways.create.title: Create Gateway
gateways.create.type.description.edit: Gateway Target cannot be changed. Create a new gateway to select a different target.
gateways.create.type.title: Gateway Type
gateways.description: Cloudflare Web3 Gateways provide HTTP-accessible interfaces to various Web3 networks.
gateways.description.universal_path: You have used %{current_number} of %{max_number} IPFS Universal Path Gateways.
gateways.description.ipfs: You have used %{current_number} of %{max_number} IPFS DNSlink Gateways.
gateways.description.ethereum: You have used %{current_number} of %{max_number} Ethereum Gateways.
gateways.dns.description: A combination of records need to be added to your DNS for your gateway to be able to receive and route traffic appropriately. These records are added to your Cloudflare DNS automatically when you create a gateway.
gateways.dns.title: Web3 Gateway DNS records
gateways.dnslink.description: Further documentation on this can be found within the <0>documentation</0>.
gateways.edit.title: Edit Gateway
gateways.errors.empty_target: Gateway Type must not be empty.
gateways.errors.long_description: Gateway Description must be less than 500 characters
gateways.errors.not_subdomain: Must be a subdomain of the selected zone.
gateways.plans.descriptions.basic: Get started with our basic plan to test out the %{subType} gateway, which is ideal for lower traffic applications or personal projects.
gateways.plans.descriptions.premium: Upgrade to our premium plan for higher-traffic applications and critical infrastructure.
gateways.plans.downgrade:
If you downgrade now, you will still have access to your premium features until %{date}.

To proceed with the downgrade, click Continue.
gateways.plans.downgrade_toast: Your subscription will be downgraded on the next billing period.
gateways.title: Web3 Gateways
gateways.type.disabled: Gateway type cannot be changed. Create a new Gateway to select a different target.
gateways.remove.description: You are deleting the gateway for the hostname named **%{hostname}** and all associated hostname DNS records. Deleting this rule will impact your traffic and cannot be undone.
gateways.remove.title: Delete hostname
gateways.upsell.description: Web3, or the distributed web, is a set of technologies that enables hosting of content and web applications in a serverless manner by leveraging distributed systems and consensus protocols.
gateways.upsell.eth.1: Easily access the Ethereum network for read and write operations.
gateways.upsell.eth.2: Leverage Cloudflare's global Anycast network to cache Ethereum content for low latency and improved performance.
gateways.upsell.eth.3: Take advantage of Cloudflare's built-in security and delivery optimizations.
gateways.upsell.explore.1: Cloudflare Ethereum and IPFS Gateways help Web3 developers do what they do best: develop applications, without having to worry about running the infrastructure required to support Ethereum (Eth) or IPFS nodes.
gateways.upsell.explore.2: Ensure your decentralized applications' security, reliability, and performance by integrating with Cloudflare's global Anycast network.
gateways.upsell.explore.3: Manage your Web3 infrastructure in Cloudflare's trusted  developer platform while reducing operational costs associated with running your own environment.
gateways.upsell.ipfs: View files stored on the InterPlanetary File System
gateways.upsell.ipfs.1: Easily retrieve, serve, and cache IPFS content for the best user experience.
gateways.upsell.ipfs.2: Serve IPFS content through your own domains.
gateways.upsell.ipfs.3: Take advantage of Cloudflare's built-in security and delivery optimizations.
gateways.upsell.title: Subscribe to Web3 Gateways
ipfs.gateway.description: Cloudflare's IPFS Gateway lets you access content stored on the InterPlanetary File System (IPFS) quickly and easily, without downloading any special software or giving up any storage space on your computer.
ipfs.gateway.title: IPFS Gateway
blocklist.description: Block content access for a specific CID or content path for this Universal gateway.
blocklist.create_entry_form.title: Create a blocklist entry
blocklist.create_entry_form.label.conten:
For a CID, please add a valid CIDv0 or CIDv1 string 
 For a Content Path, please ensure the entry starts with /ipfs/<cid> or /ipns/<hostname>
Add a CID or content path to block
blocklist.delete_entry.description: You are deleting the **%{entry_name}** entry from the **%{hostname}** universal gateway blocklist. Deleting this blocklist entry will impact the content users can access through this gateway and cannot be undone.
